verses.verse: וַיֹּ֧סֶף <WH3254> vai-Yo-sef Then again אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah a wife וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <WH8034> u-she-Mah and her name קְטוּרָֽה׃ <WH6989> ke-tu-Rah. [was] Keturah

וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led And she bare ל֗וֹ lo, אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זִמְרָן֙ <WH2175> zim-Ran him Zimran וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יָקְשָׁ֔ן <WH3370> ya-ke-Shan, and Jokshan וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מְדָ֖ן <WH4091> me-Dan and Medan וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> mid-Yan; and Midian וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יִשְׁבָּ֖ק <WH3435> yish-Bak and Ishbak וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שֽׁוּחַ׃ <WH7744> Shu-ach. and Shuah

וְיָקְשָׁ֣ן <WH3370> ve-ya-ke-Shan And Jokshan יָלַ֔ד <WH3205> ya-Lad, begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁבָ֖א <WH7614> she-Va Sheba וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et דְּדָ֑ן <WH1719> de-Dan; and Dedan וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons דְדָ֔ן <WH1719> de-Dan, of Dedan הָי֛וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become אַשּׁוּרִ֥ם <WH805> 'ash-shu-Rim were Asshurim וּלְטוּשִׁ֖ים <WH3912> u-le-tu-Shim and Letushim וּלְאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3817> u-le-'um-Mim. and Leummim

וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten gave אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after ל֖וֹ lo לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak. all that he had unto Isaac

Mamre
